historyItem.sql: SELECT first_name, last_name, 'Yazılım Departmanı' AS department FROM employees WHERE department_id = (SELECT department_id FROM departments WHERE department_name = 'Yazılım') UNION ALL SELECT first_name, last_name, 'Pazarlama Departmanı' AS department FROM employees WHERE department_id = (SELECT department_id FROM departments WHERE department_name = 'Pazarlama');
